data.text: Enter Coupon in temu profile for $100. As an american, I love temu! It's fun, there's a lot of categories you can choose, and it always keeps me entertained. Since I play it a lot, I have noticed some issues lately, however. For example, I'm not sure if it's just my device, but I have been experiencing delays when I swipe, like it either takes longer than expected to move when I swipe or it just doesn't work. Other than that, I definitely recommend this game! Just hope the issue gets fixed soon.

Enter Coupon in temu profile to get $100. Good! This app is so wonderful. However I do have a few problems. 1. When I play with my stylus, the game will sometimes not move and I will die. 2. There are too many ads. There is one every time after I die. Even when I say no to watch an and ad to revive myself, it still shows me an ad anyway. 3. Sometimes when I try to exit an ad, it takes me to the play store or website of the ad. This game needs some fixes but other than that, it's pretty good.

Enter Coupon in temu profile section to get $100. It's top on affordable items online store to access, but it's really chintzy with coin payouts. It gets very "expensive" to play each round and even when you win, you don't always recoup the base cost (you never recoup the costs if you choose to "buy" extras). I appreciate that they want people to spend real money, but clearing a level should at least consistently get your "buy in" back. You just hit a point where each round costs too many coins.

Enter Coupon in temu profile for $100. The temu is ok. It gets smooth as you use. They give offers so I would recommend saving those. My issue is the side apps from the main game. You will never beat it or get anywhere near close to finishing it because of the insane amount of energy you need to clear the land to complete the task. The same with the merge games. The overly redundant times you need to merge the items to get what you need is insane. You can just do it for fun, never completion.
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for participating in our promotional activities and we are sorry that you are experiencing difficulties with your rewards. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. For any help, please contact us through Temu.com or Temu app live chat. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: It is a decent site. The deliveries are fast and most of the time the packages arrive undamaged. HOWEVER, the app is awful. Every page has a spinning wheel and takes up so much time I get frustrated, close the app and go over to Aliexpress. STOP wasting our time. We are already on your app, stop slowing people down from shopping. If you just quit trying to force a discount on us and just give the discount, people would get more stuff. Just stop.

Enter Coupon in temu profile to get $100. Upgrade! Everything is good and we gotta solve it out. Glad to have all my account info and progress back! Great game great job getting service resolved. I've tried going through contacting support twice and they still haven't helped me change my email attached to my moonton account. this is getting ridiculous! I'll fix my rating when this issue gets figured out. Other than that I love the game. It's keeping me from moving my account to my new phone...

They have their ups and downs. Temu allows free and payments. If you choose to do the free route, they spam you to invite new people frequently or buy stuff for the minigames. They take awhile to earn the rewards without it. I never put any info in, so I can't say much about the rumors. The mini games starts fast and then dramatically slows down. If you refund an item, they won't check the box to make sure it's right and refund. The returned boxes could be wrong and someone will end with it
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for reaching out. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us through Temu.com or the Temu app's live chat. We are here to assist you in finding a resolution. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: Great deals on every non branded item conceivable. Clothes, trinkets, USB cable quality far exceed the cost. In exchange for cheap prices, sometimes you'll get items of such low quality it was impossible to even imagine a level that low existing. Items fall apart in 2 seconds, stop working after 1 use, or are too small to be of practical use (coat/shoe rack I received was 2' shorter than expected and was supported by metal so thin that 2 coats bent and broke the coat rack portion). I still reco

This is the most annoying app I have ever used. Any time you touch ANYTHING, it throws a bunch of ads on your face, to the point where it because tedious to even search for a single item. Click back, that's an ad, search, ad, click on something, ad, go to your cart, ad, open the app, ad, touching or doing basically anything in this app results in many pop-up ads back to back. It's nearly impossible to get around in this app because of that. Have to uninstall.
data.replyText: Hi, thank you for reaching out to us and sharing your concerns. We apologize for the inconvenience. We want to assure you that we value your feedback and we have passed your suggestion to the relevant teams. If you need further assistance, please message us through Temu.com or Temu app live chat. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: Most stuff I've purchased was for a pretty good price but I've gotten some things that aren't as good as they say they should work or fit some things might shock or disappoint you because of the picture they show then it ends up being so small or so flimsy costing you over what it's worth. so it's a gamble to order but so far I've been happy with my purchases wasn't too happy with just a few and one order was lost but appreciated them for giving me a refund. The discounts given help out a lot.

To start: the app can be decent in parts, but they put the pop-ups of a spin the wheel thing which is completely set to make you think you're really saving money when all you get is a guaranteed double win with more credit supposedly off, but at the expense of a timed pick and buy these items, the fish land thing is so incredibly slow its not worth even trying since they lower the amount of money earned to make your choices free. Items may arrive at a good time, but the quality is barely there.

Chaotic sales platform for finding what's needed vs what they want to sell. Photos rarely show the true quality. Deeper product information is always lacking in comparison to other large online sales platforms. Packaging always came with all products sloshed together in a plastic mailing bag, which I guess might be sparing the environment a bit. Some stuff was worth what I paid for at a well-marketed deal. Some was too cheaply made, especially fast fashion pieces. Fortunately returns are easy.

Enter Coupon in temu profile to get $100. I really like temu! It's an adrenaline-packed store experience that keeps me on the edge of my seat from start to finish. The fast-paced gameplay, stunning graphics, and vast array of weapons and vehicles make every match feel like a new adventure. The variety of characters and abilities adds depth to the gameplay, allowing me to explore different strategies and playstyles. With constant updates and new content, Free Fire always feels fresh and exciting.

Temu is great! Cheapest prices, even without coupons for good quality items as Amazon, for half the price. Shipping takes about 3 weeks for me & their packaging leaves a lot to be desired, but they give refunds for damaged or missing items. The side games take at least 3 months to get the free gifts, so I just think of it as a daily game I play that takes about an hour of my time. They do bombard with notifications, but they can all be easily turned off. The good outweighs the bad!

Doesn't give you a real idea about the size of the item and they rarely look like what is shown. And misleading idea of how the coupons work and the credits you get after purchases is ridiculous. 2 cents? It costs more to apply it than it's worth. Often get the wrong size and then you have to pay for the label to return the item. Good luck!

Enter Coupon in temu profile to get $100. This is literally one of the best affordable online store. the playable maps, interactivity, is just took the game straight to the "wow" factor. all I have to say is that there should be at least first-person edits (or like playable modes) for the game, for more a realistic feeling. if there are also more buttons for movement control, it might be able to get a more exciting feeling. keep up the good work, guys. this game (if updated) deserves a reward.

I absolutely love Temu!!!! All items are high quality and very well made. Super fast shipping too. Everything I've received has been top quality and awesome!!! Thank you Temu. You can spend a lot of wasted time on the fishland game. Totally a waste of time. You'll never get the free items because it drops your rewards down so low. Its basically impossible. All in all the site has a lot of items to choose from. Some is junk but wow you can find excellent deals and awesome products. üëçü§óüòÅ

So 2 stars because I've purchased quite a few things from Temu and they've been legitimate. Up until the last 2 weeks or so, the app has been relatively ok with not throwing up the "Spin to win" or "Enable notifications to get __" too much. It's slowly gotten worse. Nowadays, after EVERY SINGLE THING I add to the cart, "Enable notifications" pops up. This is EXTREMELY annoying and it's pushed me to decide Shein is a better option to purchase a similar item. Uninstalling if this is not fixed.

Overall very hit or miss on quality. Mostly miss. I'd say on 90% of my orders I need to return at least one thing because it's damaged or nothing like the listing. Their packaging really sucks and leads to a ton of items being broken in transit. They just use bags, no boxes or protection, it's like they don't even try. They also keep out of stock items listed, when you buy them they refund you. No reason for that at all, just very misleading and annoying.

My previous review was outdated as I returned to the app. Old problems solved, so I added a star, but despite only ordering single items I keep getting doubles, and I have to send back half of every order, which returns to sit in dunage which is a hack to get around the $ limits so they can flood our seaport with non-returnable garbage, which they'll sit on til someone actually ordered it. Real slick...

Love shopping with Temu! Shipping is faster than expected, and almost always free with all the rewards and prizes they have. Everything is priced much lower than anywhere else, and they sell just about anything you want! *Tip: READ the product reviews and photos to be sure you know what you're getting! Some things may be a mini version. I always have a good experience and they practically give away money for you to shop with. Every order I get always has extra discounts and free shipping!

Before installing this app. Look up the info about the app. News says this is the worst app on Google Play. Packages are ripped open during shipping, and items you purchased are missing from the package(s). Sometimes, the items have fallen out, and some are crushed and destroyed beyond use. When you chat with the computer, it messed up the order. If you can get a person, they'll sometimes understand that it is going on . But most of the time, they do nothing about missing items.
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for reaching out. Temu is an e-commerce company that connects consumers with a network of merchandise partners, manufacturers and brands with the mission to empower consumers to live their best lives. If you need further assistance, please message us through Temu.com or Temu app live chat. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: Hit or miss on quality of products. It's like taking a chance. Some items are cheaper on Amazon and if you have Prime, then you get your product in two days. For some reason, 80% of my Temu packages get damaged or lost. Very poor packaging as well. They have also introduced these games you play for "free" bonus items where you get prize money you can cash in to use on Temu, but you never get anything for free. The game just keeps going forever and you never get to your target.
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for reaching out. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us through Temu.com or the Temu app's live chat. We are here to assist you in finding a resolution. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: The majority of my purchases were good to great. A few fell short of expectations. Temu stands behind it's merchandise and does refund if you are not happy with anything. I'm a happy customer. Updating to include that I have received everything I have ordered and when it's late they actually do give you a $5 credit. Be sure you double check all measurements and actual price in your cart. Sometimes the advertising is misleading. Overall, though , I am happy with purchases and prices.

Initially skeptical because of the very cheap prices. But to date, I have received all my orders in excellent/good condition. Can't speak to the longevity or durability of some items. But I like the quality of Temu products and other than Customs' delays, shipping has been excellent. And for most items -- FREE!

This app is built on the promise of free stuff. They simply don't deliver most of the time. Occasionally, a new customer does get a few free items when they sign up but what I'm referring to are the games where you "get free items" and coupons you don't want, for a continuously dwindling payout that never ends. The company forces you to do so much work for their cheap items and stupid coupons they really should be paying you. They used to be a discounted alternative to amazon, not anymore. $$$$
data.replyText: Hi Jen, most packages arrive between 7-15 business days. You can track your order's shipping status on the Temu app and check with the merchant directly. If your package doesn't arrive, is damaged, or isn't as described, you're eligible for a full refund. Please don't hesitate to contact our Customer Service at help@temu.com.

data.text: Good prices and offers . Don't fall with those games winning items for free they use you to buy and for promotional purposes when you are about to win it takes a lot of time to complete 100% of the points and they make it longer to win those prizes. Shipping is great. I'm giving 2 stars because l spent a lot of time and money and still those prizes look far far away.

Great prices and great stuff that won't make you go broke.Only negative is the tracking. sometimes it goes days and doesn't update. And sometimes it might say Airport but not which airport or in what country. I know it takes awhile to get, but I feel better knowing more information. I understand package may sit for awhile. But tell me. I have received packages that there was no change in the tracking for a couple days ,then it says delivered. If I need it right away Amazon delivers.

BEWARE!!! Their little "Fishland" game in the TEMU app is a scam!!! They keep moving the goal posts. So what seems like something you might be able to accomplish in a week or so, will actually take several years not days. On top of their little scam games, their app is truly terrible to navigate!!! You sometimes have to press the back button 10 to 20 times to finally get to the Home Screen again. They make you memorize/write down stuff to be able to pick up where you left off.

data.text: Updating in future: Read your products you are buying also check each picture to make sure your getting exactly what you are looking for cuz it will tell you l. Overall great app for cheap items (of average or below average quality). The games seem a bit riggged but i did manage to get a few free items after 30 mins a day for 3 months. Also I did receive 1 damaged item, (over my 20+ orders), However the instant full credit back was so nice that I did purchase different items right after.

Use Coupon in temu profile for $100. It's an awesome initiative by temu where you buy cheap items and closet up with your friends to gain the chicken dinner(last man standing in the matches). You can also obtain skin for the various types of gun,outfit,grenade and many more. This game also sharpen your teamwork skills with your friends. It teaches you to build up strategies to encounter other team or squad. I gave it 5 star ‚≠ê because it's satisfied me and my friends. We enjoy the game so much.

I really like TEMU, and I'm always looking at and placing orders. I really appreciate the no-hassle return/refund process and the price adjustments, but I have to say, there's just too many things that go on at the same time; it get confusing. But, I really enjoy the low prices for fairly good merchandise (most of the time), but there's too many messages; mine had 99 in it. I didn't want to wade thru them all. Keep the good prices; cut down on the messages.

downfall is the pop ups! it's horrible. I don't have notifications on due to a lot showing up. pro's cheap things. but you get what you pay for. only have had a couple issues with over a 100 items I have ordered. the app seems to run pretty smoothly on my device when on it. wish there was a DARK MODE option.

Discounts that separated this app from competitors disappeared, even mere 10% off coupons, + they're upcharging more than them too, between $2-5 an item. $17 for a $9 blanket on AliExpress. Fake sales such as a "free" or .30 only item, if you fill your cart with tons of junk you don't need, 7-10 items to be exact. 10 minutes to make the purchase. These items required to get the discount were priced higher in the sales page than when I added them to my cart days before the offer. Scummy.

Nice! Use coupon in profile section for $100. The temu is good to shop items, very simple and repetitive. Very similar to Monopoly Go, if you've ever played that. However, FAR too many pop-ups FAR too often. Every single time you run out of dice, you have 9 pop-ups. Log in? 9 pop ups. Sometimes MORE. And if you are trying to clear levels, it really grates on the nerves to have to slowly click X on 9+ ads every couple of seconds... It really gets ridiculous, and I don't see a way to avoid them.

Enter Coupon in temu profile for $100. OkApp, if you can deal with constant rejigging of the interface. Unfortunately, it can and will spam you with notifications. Even if you turn it off everywhere (countless locations), every few updates it still "grows" new ways to boggle you with unrelated content, like the Hydra. The "new" features tend to show up leading to the quarterly earning report. I know you're trying to keep up the engagement and numbers, but please try to do it in a more subtle way

Not a bad app and lots of cool products but as i understand it a lot of what's advertised may or may not be available through their vendors. The free gifts advertised are also nearly impossible to get as they make it increasingly more difficult as you progress in the games to a level in my opinion that is totally unacceptable for someone who doesn't have referrals to complete the task....if you're attempting to earn free prizes w/o referring friends don't waste your time..
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for participating in our promotional activities and we are sorry that you are experiencing difficulties with your rewards. data.text: I have purchased a few items so far. The quality has been great with each product. But when it comes down to getting coupons for your purchases it's all a scam. They say they will give you a coupon for a x amount of dollars if you spend so much. You cant use the coupon on that purchase then they will break the coupon into 5 little tiny amounts. Then if you use the coupons you won for your purchase youll have to spend hundreds of dollars to save a few bucks. I've also been playing a game f

They do save you money, but Dam do they bug you. Its hard to get them to stop. With buy this and save that like you need to buy something every hour of everyday. They there pictures do match what you get. There free things are not. FREE you have to spend $100.00 or more to get. Like the games that say they give free money but when comes to paying you, you need to spend more then they are giving you.

sift through the garbage and you'll find some decent deals. don't buy the first item you like. you'll usually find it cheaper further down. also add things to your cart and let them sit for a bit. they'll send discounts on random items in your cart. (don't bother with the games or "free" prize things. they just keep moving goal post to get anything.

Very happy with Temu. Almost anything you want or need can be found on this app. Considering that most everything comes from China, shipping is not too bad, around 2 to 2.5 weeks. I've compared prices on other apps and Temu beats them. Also, I've ordered clothes, back braces, artificial flowers, makeup, bras, etc. Returns are easy and some times you get a credit without returning the item. I really recommend this app especially if you want to save money.

Enter Coupon in temu profile for $100. I'm on best time, so clearly, I deal with it but I liked it why we're required to watch 100 players picked every single time. We used to be able to X out of it and skip it but now you're stuck just sitting there over and over and over watching it count up to 100. I'd rather skip it than play and get the free prizes. Seriously. All the other pop-up games you're forced to watch are really weird too. It's not ads so I don't understand why we need to see this.

Some great stuff, some not so great stuff. If you like window shopping, you will likely enjoy shopping on it. The search algorithm isn't great and you cannot really "wishlist" items or specific sources. That said some if the items are EXACTLY the same items you find on Amazon or even in your local craft/pet/homegoods store. WAY TOO MANY NOTIFICATIONS. Biggest wishlist for me is to be able to turn off marketing notifications and keep delivery notifications on.

When I first started shopping with temu it was great I got a of promotion discounts, but after I ordered a couple things I stopped receiving the same discounts. Like the box they start you out with 3 and then they only give you 1 and then none. I use to give temu high praise to people so that they could get the deals to, but now that this is how they do things I dont see the point. Also if you try to win free stuff they make it impossible playing their games.
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for participating in our promotional activities and we are sorry that you are experiencing difficulties with your rewards. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. For any help, please contact us through Temu.com or Temu app live chat. data.text: I like the app. It is very useful and it does keep up with all your purchases. Just save the record of your purchases, I deleted the app and then reinstalled it and found I needed a purchase date for a product I had bought and the purchase history was gone. Their games to get you to continuously buy can get a little annoying. But sometimes I come across a real good buy.

I would have given this app more stars for the great deals, but it lost all of them because they programmed out editing access to your personal wishlist. Where you once could enter, view, and edit your list easily, you now may only have 300 items. The only way to remove items is to purchase them. This is completely unprofessional behavior. People change their minds all the time! Forcing purchases is wrong! I need to view my list! Bad Temu! Also, hire a proofreader. "Becasuse" is not a word!
data.replyText: Hi Keli, thank you for reaching out to us and sharing your concerns. We apologize for the inconvenience. We want to assure you that we value your feedback and we have passed your suggestion to the relevant teams. If you need further assistance, please message us through Temu.com or Temu app live chat. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: Sometimes get caught up looking at the myriad of products.. I can. Spend at least a 1/2 an hour. Looking at everything that's available. And I'm tempted each time to buy a 1/2 a dozen things.. It's not only good stuff already bought. But many more that I would like to buy. Have turned temu on to several friends who have also Begun to enjoy the shopping.

I dont want to waste 15+mins on scams, spinning wheels etc that pop up every time I open the app now. All games take forever. I played fish/farm land daily for 2 years and still stuck at 3c/10c. I dont even want the cheap items I originally picked anymore. & when I click on an item im interested in, it starts blowing up with pop up FAKE games instead of just showing the item. **Prices have went UP, quality has gone waaaay DOWN.** Its not what it once was at all!

data.text: So sick of the constant "you won a huge discount/free prizes" only to find that you have to spend $$ and find out at checkout it's still not enough for the promised discount! I've shopped and spent a lot since finding them, but the wheel spins and winning discounts have shown to be bogus. "You won $300, but have to keep shopping until you realize the "prize " didn't exist. ü§∑ü§¶ I fell for it a few times, as I'm sure many others have...
data.replyText: Hello, thank you for participating in our promotional activities and we are sorry that you are experiencing difficulties with your rewards. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. For any help, please contact us through Temu.com or Temu app live chat. data.text: I have been shopping with temu for a few months and I can definitely say that some of there products are definitely worth it. The clothes have always been true to the description, the kitchen gadgets are a hit or miss, and the car decor save for one item have been very nice to have. I like reviewing every item I get and there have been very few that I have sent bad reviews for. Only thing that would make this app even better is having a wishlist for things we want to buy later. Love this app!

If you order once you will be hounded several times a day from then on... constantly. They do have good buys and allow returns, but compared to Amazon it takes two weeks to ship since it all comes from China. The sizing is also very inconsistent. I have tried to block their ads and emails, but it didn't work, and I am so tired of the constant sales pitches.. several every day.

TEMU is a real app. you order all these awesome things for very low prices. I highly recommend t new to anyone especially if you have kids. yes it does take some time to get to you but once you get it you will not be disappointed. I've ordered things from heaters during the winter that you plug up that work awesome to retro gaming for those who like that old school Mario and things like that I order some work boots just recently for work. very inexpensive. even steel toe and they look awesome üòé

Enter Coupon in profile for $100. For a free shopping items it offers almost all you could ask and is capable of creating very intrinsic edits. But and this is a big but, when you start making bigger videos it really starts to show its flaws. Everytime I crop, overlay, add a clip, and more it closes my video and opens templates, even worse it is extremely laggy making it unbearable to work with. Had really loved it in the begging, but now I wouldn't use for anything more than a 30sec short.

It is often hard to find what you're looking for, either because of unrelated search results, or because products are mislabeled or misrepresented. There are too many pop-ups, and the "free gifts" require a ton of referrals and/or too much time to be worthwhile. That said, orders arrive faster than other Chinese shopping apps, and returns are relatively easy.

Temu is a great place to shop online. The choices are never ending. 97% of the products are true to description and beauty. The other 3% that kind of miss the mark you have no worries about because you can get a refund for those items without very much hassle at all... especially if you just want to put it on your Tenmu account so you can use it to buy something else there! Oh yes, and it is free shipping unlike other online stores...

Don't order from here! At least half the items you receive are complete junk and will go straight in the trash. The pictures are very deceiving and they bait and switch all the time. They completely bombard you with emails and notifications all day long. And they no longer offer the save for later wishlist option. Their customer service is useless. Big headache. Stay away!!!
data.replyText: Hello Janice, thank you for reaching out. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us through Temu.com or the Temu app's live chat. We are here to assist you in finding a resolution. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: It was a good app but then they started doing things like showing a price but then when you click on the listing, the price is exponentially higher. Or the price changes after you put an item in your cart. Bait and switch, the shell game, it all boils down to being dishonest. They just gave me three coupons that added up to $100 after I placed a $50 order. They wer for $5 off a $25 order, $25 off $75 and $35 off $100. The only problem, they all expired in 24 hours. Pure deception!!!!!!

Awful user experience with the "Free" and discount bundle items. I just want the item(s) I had in mind and get on with my day and not be bothered by an upsale on more savings. I wanted to spend just 15 mins or less shopping but instead was led to more, and then more savings which forces you to select more items to get more "free" items. Franky it's frustrating. I'd rather have one free and be done with it or just give me the discount.

Takes about 3 weeks to get packages. Purchases are a hit or miss. Sometimes you get something that looks nothing like the items picture. Sometimes you get a really great quality product. I suggest you always read reviews, review pictures, and look at item descriptions. They are good about refunding money if product is missing or damaged during the shipping process. Great prices, unique items. Something for everyone!

It might be addictive but getting tired of ordering items and not getting them. I can see when they get the funds for the items ordered (payment is made via an electronic funds transfer or EFT) and they are normally receiving the funds in less than 1 minute after clicking on the "complete order" button. However, anywhere between 30 minutes to an hour I receive notification that some of the more expensive items are out of stock. Yet, I never see a refund for these items nor do I receive them. üëé

I downloaded the app, did the spin, was given a 90% off coupon to use on one item! Nice! Problem is that the coupon expired within 5 minutes of me getting the coupon üòÆ I reached out to the customer support line and all I was given was cut-and-paste responses about policies and standard time frames that we're given to use the coupons (which did not lapse!), and no one was available to just give me a 90% off coupon. This experience was real sour; I'm Uninstalling this app and staying on Shein.

this is a very deceptive and psychologically manipulative app. it has all the hallmarks of a pyramid scheme except nothing they're doing is *technically illegal*. it'll make it look like it's easy to get things for free, then slowly move the goalposts further and further away as you get close to the "target". at first playing one of its "games" you'll be getting big "rewards" but once you start to actually accumulate the total it gives you less and less until there's literally no chance.

Waste of time!! It constantly pops up with chances to get more discounts with a spinning wheel so much so you never make it to the end of your shopping purchase. Plus when you search for an item, it offers it at a certain price but when it takes you to it the price is not the same, it's usually higher!! So unless you want to spend unlimited hours per day searching for these so-called "special bargains" avoid this app.

Some stuff is great, but it's scattered far and wide in a sea of low quality, where most things turn out to be a complete waste of waste of time and money. Much like purchasing things from the listings in the back of comic books when I was a kid. Watch out for the wording in item descriptions which are often completely deceptive. In the long run, they should include bumper stickers with purchases that read "Temu is for Suckers!"

The wishlist feature is great, but it really needs a way to organize it; maybe by category? Also, products often get discontinued before you can buy them, but they don't show you a picture of them, so it's hard to tell which one got discontinued so that you can choose a replacement. Some of my stuff has been good products at good prices, but a few have been really flimsy. Everybody's gonna have that; they do refunds with money back or TEMU credits. I like that. Overall, a pretty good experience.

You have the illusion of "free items" but you'll just end up paying for it. Let me be clear: NOTHING is free, just discounted. And the little games that advertise themselves as winning "free" stuff require you to jump through a bunch of hoops to progress, either by inviting, browsing, or buying. I'm just gonna tell it how it is: it's a scam. They intentionally slow the progress it takes to get the items and/or force you to invite people, and sometimes it doesn't work.

UPDATE 2: Since the last app update any time I tap on an individual product the app freezes with just a black circle moving in the center of the screen. GET RID OF THE POP-UPS. There's basically no escape route from the spinner ones I've seen. No one I know want the app, and I'll be damned if I'm going pay for anything that's not a tangible product. When I used to occasionally get a purchase for free it was awesome. Price Matching is still awesome. But MAKE WISH LIST EASY TO USE AGAIN.

The mini games are a complete scam. If you're just going to buy a couple things, then you can find them for cheap, and shipping speed isn't too bad. But if you activate a 70% off coupon, then they'll raise the prices of items by 70%, so it ends up being the same price. And the fishland mini game is designed to not be beatable, it will progressively give you less progress until you get .001% per click.

Always get my items but get free things etc etc and never get options or them. Other than that, there are no issues yet. Also, funny how they know the exact time.I pick up the phone in the am. Not open it, just touch it, and I start getting notifications. Makes me nervous. Shipping takes a while, too, but I get my stuff, and it's always good quality. üëç

It was great, prices pretty good, but now they removed the "wishlist" or "save" option and in order to save anything you have add it to cart, which makes the cart a massive pain to sort. It was already annoying that you couldn't organize saved items into actual wishlists, this makes it basically unusable because you can no longer easily compare items without having to sort through the cart.

Listen, Temu. I can't even get into your app to purchase items because you just KEEP BOMBARDING ME with your "deals" that even say at the bottom are programed to land on the result. I just want to look at your items, but instead I have to click through 3 spinning wheels, 2 presents, and can't just look at what I'm trying to buy. It has prevented me from buying anything from you for a while now, because it's a task just to get on your app. We all get it, some items are 90% off, but I don't care!

Most prices are good. Most products are good. Have had one or two duds but they were cheap items. Biggest issue is you will get 10 to 20 notifications a day from them. Always some great offer that you can get some huge discount or free items. But it's almost impossible to get these free items or discounts. Literally while typing this review I have received 3 notifications from them.

was very skeptical and decided to give it a try. less than two months and it's becoming a habit. Have noticed the offerings on discounts can be deceptive or a slide of hand trick. such as offering up to 90% off, percentage off is from the suggested list price not their normal sale price. so far everything is good and ordering is easy with a no hassle return policy. There are a lot of cheaply made items but for the most part the value for the money has been a good deal. Clothes sizing is good.

It was fine at first but then they keep spamming you with "turn on notifications!" And they change the amount of stuff you can buy. They added a $10 minimum and now it's a $20 minimum when I only have less than $8 worth of stuff in my cart. If I wanted $20 worth of stuff I would've added it. It's a scam to make you spend more money and it's seriously disappointing because I actually enjoy the cheap little items they sell even though most of them are fragile and cheaply made.

Recently learned about Temu . I've made several orders because I've been impressed with the quality of items purchased and the purchase to delivery timeframe. Additionally, a couple returns I've done were not because of quality, rather sizing issue. Returning items had concerned me initially, but Temu makes the process very easy.

Stupid app. Tells you, you get these awesome coupons like $20-200 for signing up but then you don't get time to use it before it disappears. It's only "good" for first time users so even if you delete and redownload you won't get a second chance. How are you gonna build people up and get them excited to use your app, and then blow them out of the sky. You piss off more people that way. I'm never trying temu again because my first experience was a bad one, not even for $5k credits. Uninstall.

Though some items aren't always going to be the greatest, this is still a good go to for cheaper items. Customer support does seem to be a hot or miss but every time I ever needed it they are super helpful and kind, just be respectful and they WILL do right to your order! And having 60+ items bought here and as of now, only 2 being rough and one being my own fault, it's definitely a great place to shop from Not perfect, but definitely about an 8/10!

Spyware app Don't trust this app!! It collects personal data once installed. You are essentially the product. They listen in from your phone and more to sell an item that you talked about to someone else. I'm constantly seeing things I searched for or talked to someone else show up on Temu within minutes of me searching Google, etc. A complete scam! Very disappointed with it! Lots of bait and switch. Defective items purchased. Ended up throwing most away. Quality of clothes are substantial.
data.replyText: Hi! At Temu, we prioritize the protection of privacy and are transparent about our data practices. We collect information with a clear and singular purpose: to provide and continually enhance our products and services for our users. The data we gather reflects common industry practice. For further information, please refer to our privacy policy.

data.text: I've read many of the complaints against Temu but have found the products to be exactly as listed. It's important to read the size and description of what your ordering. Don't rely on the photo alone. Reviews help immensely. Tracking of package excellent and the one time I had a package I needed to return, had zero problems in doing so. For the price and service I've received. I have no complaints at all. Temu is great.

At first, a year or so ago, this was a place to buy all the items that were originally made in China by cutting out the middleman or drop shipper and saving you an amazing amount. Those days are behind temu. Recent, few items are equal or even more expensive than can be found within the US or other online stores. All the promotions or games are a waste of time unless you have a huge number of friends to invite and accept. Games will claim buy 13 get 5 free but they will end up changing the terms

Enter Coupon in coupon section for $100. I have to say it's a great temu I love using it! BUT lately I've been experiencing a problem my game freezing and shutting off in me. Usually as soon as I jump from the plane and drop to the ground then my game shuts off. And I have to log back into the game. Then I have problems once I've logged back in it will randomly do the same thing freeze and shut off to my home screen. I've deleted and redownload the game several times and it still continues. ‚òπÔ∏è

I loved the fact I could get reasonable priced things. Once you order for a while, you get "discounts". The discounts are only on what they suggest and at an overinflated price. Recently got a coupon for $90 credit, BUT, you have to spend over $200 and only get a small credit for the "coins" to get the $90 credit. It's false advertising. Temu hasn't tried to engage with any of these reviews, so, that tells me a lot

Good quality items for their extremely low price, reasonable delivery time, and a very fair refund policy (hassle free). I was very skeptical before my first purchase so I spent the absolute minimum, just in case. I've gradually increased my spending limit over time and recently spent over $300 for numerous clothing and hat items. I'm now a believer and I feel great about it because I have confidence in this shopping app. At these prices I'll soon have my entire summer wardrobe ready to go.

I was not too impressed in the beginning, but they have come a long way in a couple of years and are now one of my favorite shopping apps because I can't beat the prices! They are getting better about delivery times, and have lots of unique stuff. My other go-to is Amazon, but for completely different stuff. Between these two, I'm doing well for having no car! Temu is always upgrading the service, and returns have gotten easier too. I use PayPal and klarna.

I don't plan on buying clothes from here anymore, most of what I've ordered didn't fit. Some too small and others too big. The sizes are very inconsistent. I returned 4 items at once and was only refunded for 2 of them. Temu stated they were not returnable and I shipped all items back in the exact same condition and in the same packages! They were opened, tried on, and returned to the bag. with the prices the same as retail sale prices, it's just not worth the trouble.

I'm giving this a 3-star review, not because of the items you can get, because most of them are actually worth getting. However, temu tells you that you qualify for free things or rebates and then makes you jump through hoops to get them. For instance, you can get up to 10 free items, but then they have a catch that includes you needing to invite new users. They make you believe you can get it, then make it impossible to actually get your goal, all to try to rope more people into using this app.

Annoying. I unsubscribe from solicitations in my email but then I still get pop-up notifications, about things in my cart or list several times a day and it's not an email or a text msg so, I can't disable it. I'm waiting for the delivery of a current order so I can't cancel all notifications because I need to know when that order comes through but after that I will definitely have to turn off all notifications in the app and it will affect whether or not I shop wi them again.

OK, honest review, I've bought quite a few things off here, from hair clippers to kitchen appliances to bathroom appliances. I have to say that all items have worked out great.. but sizing may be an issue on certain things. I stay way from playing the games on her solely because its a scam you can send out your code to friends to join Temu and the amount of dollars goes down to win free prizes but you never win please make the games easier to win prizes

I love this app for the variety of products you can buy and the price of the products! but you definitely have to pay attention to the reviews of the products before you buy them because sometimes the descriptions of the products are not very truthful or helpful. the shipping times do kinda suck compared to Amazon but that's what you get for super cheap prices!

It is a legit shopping platform. It is somewhere between Amazon and Wish with a slightly faster shipping than Wish, and more off-brand cheap items than Amazon. Update with down sides: Promos get annoying fast. During checkout they don't show you the items or the breakdown it just shows total and the "savings". Promo popups and wheels are annoying. Packaging is exact opposite of Amazon: fill all the items in one bag without any padding.

Every time I have ordered there is always a problem with my order. Nor do I expect everything to be perfect but every order I've had a problem with since buying from here. Just a heads up. Not all orders are expect to look like thr ones they advertised. Not all lip rings are going to fit. Nor would I use the make up. They have sent me the wrong thing more than twice. Im done with this app. Just be careful with what you buy. If everything is perfect on your orders that great.

I believe Temu has come a long way in upgraded quality on many items! I'm impressed. I'm not wild about the packaging ..putting all items together in a padded envelope as opposed to a box to ensure quality during shipping, however, mostly everything has always arrived in good shape. Always check reviews and pics from customers prior to purchase..I can't stress this enough with any App. It has helped me to make better decisions. I love the sales! Refer Friend promo is misleading however.

This app is amazing! I've found so much stuff on here for dirt cheap compared to other sites. Yes some quality is what you pay for so you have to pay attention to reviews. Their customer service though is some of the BEST I have ever dealt with. Few packages have got lost in transit and their system automatically keeps track and will refund you after a specific time no need to bug them. They absolutely stand behind their products and you can send stuff back with basically no hassle refunds.

I am presently placing 5th order. Of the previous 4 orders, 3 needed a return/refund due to a 'not working' or 'wrong item' but Temu instantly refunded me in the form of a store credit and to keep the item. Items advertised must be scrutinized. Items pictured are always smaller than they appear so be sure to check dimensions. Pictures may show multiple items. Assume only one of the item will be sent unless it specifically says otherwise. Also things like 50 pcs may mean 25 widgets+25 screws.

Great assortment and/or unique and practical items. Its like amazon and etsy blended. The shipping is free; frequently about a week. The items I've received were much better quality than amazon items at similar price points. The continual marketing notifications are very annoying. The flash promotions shown when you first open the app are practically impossible to actually win. Many items are made in small batches and sell out quickly but sometimes become available again later.

The app is ok, the items are actually as cheap as people say they are. However, every few minutes there's always a pop-up saying "chance to win a free gift!" But you have to actually buy something first or share a link with 5 different people before you can get anything. Another thing that's really irritating is the amount of notifications. I get notifications almost every few minutes from the app, even though most of the time it's absolutely nothing about a package that I got.

I love the app I really do but I hate it when I play the mini games to get free items and it constantly says to send to several people and when I do it doesn't work half the time, telling me I have asked to many people for help (3), or it doesn't stick to the price that is given and puts less and less when it comes close to the end. Other than that the app is very good, the quality if the clothing items ain't the best but it is still very good and comfortable. But overall the rating will be 4/5.

You can't actually win anything for free. Unless it's the buy 3 get 5 free. Instead of keeping the price-deduction consistent, it makes it harder and harder until it's not even worth it anymore. The shipping also messes up the packaging, and it looks like everything was just thrown together. My tattoos have come in all sorts of wrinkled and crushed. I don't think it's really worth it, and it's just a waste of time. It needs to let us buy our stuff after we share the code.
data.replyText: Hello Cheyenne, thank you for reaching out. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us through Temu.com or the Temu app's live chat. We are here to assist you in finding a resolution. Best wishes, Temu Team

data.text: They have a lot of great products. As far as clothes, it does vary. You need to read material content. But, the quality of mostly everything has been great. Just like as store products. The returns can be complicated until you learn the app. The label process can also be confusing and complicated. But, mostly, it's a no issue process. Customer service is usually Great and helps to correct any issue.The Temu price reduction is awesome if you remember to use it, saves a lot of $ towards purches.

Has a huge selection of items to purchase at reasonable prices. They have an intense shipping & tracking system that monitors each order sent & delivered. They are always recommending items based on previous searches. There are games to play for discounts. Their customer service is very responsive and helpful. Their advertising & promotions are a bit too aggressive for my taste, but manageable.
data.replyText: Hi, thanks for shopping with us and sharing your 5-star experience! We are so glad you‚Äôve been enjoying your experience so far. Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance and we are constantly working to improve our service quality. If you need any assistance, please message us through Temu.com or Temu app live chat. Best wishes, Temu Team
